condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Information technology, supply, logistics and administration to effectively support country operations.

description.narrative: To mobilize high-level political commitment, UNICEF supported the National Disaster Management Authority in organizing a National Drought Mitigation consultative workshop leading to preparation of a joint UN and Government response plan for affected areas of Sindh and Balochistan. The Pakistan School Safety Framework was scaled-up with 423 schools and 1,300 teachers trained in fire safety, evacuation, school safety planning, psychosocial protection, WASH and gender-based violence in Islamabad, and piloted in Balochistan, Gilgit-Baltistan and Punjab. Preparedness was strengthened using the Global Online Emergency Preparedness Platform, seven contingency partnership agreements were signed, and long-term agreements and contingency stock for 100,000 people prepositioned. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019
